org.mkosciesza.capclient

Class ConnectionFailureEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.mkosciesza.capclient.CapEvent
        • org.mkosciesza.capclient.ConnectionFailureEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConnectionFailureEvent
extends CapEvent
    This class represents event generated when connection to CAP server is failed to established.

    0.1

    • Field Detail

      • causeCode

        public int causeCode
        The cause code of connection failure.

        0 - Normal

        1 - Unable to establish TCP connection

        2 - CAP registration failed

        Short description of the cause of connection failure.
